articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Twitter threatens legal action over Threads app - BBC
articles.description: Its owner Elon Musk says "competition is fine, cheating is not" a day after the rival app launches.
articles.content:
Twitter is considering legal action against Meta over its fast-growing rival app Threads.
Threads, which was launched to millions on Wednesday, is similar to Twitter and has been pitched by Meta bos… [+2769 chars]
